author: Staff Reporter
text:
: Students of the Government Law College, Coimbatore, boycotted classes to protest against the suicide of Dalit student Rohith Vemula.

A press release issued here on Wednesday says that the students sought action against the Hyderabad Central University administration and those responsible for “abetting” his suicide.

The boycott was also to highlight students’ rights being taken away and casteist discrimination in campuses, it adds.
title: Law College students boycott classes
